command
Class CommandController

java.lang.Object
  command.CommandController

public class CommandController
extends java.lang.Object

CommandController will create a HashMap containing references to the command classes and use resolveCommand to look up the relevant command class based on the command received. This code was originally written by hbe and has been modified to fit the goal of this project.

Author:
Nicolai, Lasse
See Also:
UDPPeer

Method Detail

processRequest

public void processRequest(java.lang.String receivedMessage,
                           java.net.DatagramPacket receivePacket)
This method is called by UDPPeer which is every time a packet is received. Is uses resolveCommand to find the relevant command class and run its execute method.

Parameters:
receivedMessage -
receivePacket -

resolveCommand

public Command resolveCommand(java.lang.String request)
Forwards a request the HashMap to lookup the command and return the relevant instantiated object.

Parameters:
request - The received command
Returns:
The instantiated object of the found command
